rootTitle: Find The Word, Get The Coin!
howToPlayContent:
-You are trying to guess a word with given 22 letters and word's description.
-If you get stuck, you can get a hint. The hint shows the next letter of your guess, but it doesn't tell  you is your current guess right or not.
-Every right guess gives you 10 coins and your level will increase by 1 and every hint costs 10 coins.

msg.getHintMsg: Do you want to get a hint? It will cost 10 coins and you will be able to see the next letter of your guess.
msg.outOfCoinsMsg:
You're out of coins!
You must have at least 10 coins to get a hint.
msg.noEmptyLetterMsg: There is no empty letter to give you a hint!
msg.gameFinishedMsg: Congratulations! You have finished the game!
msg.resetDataQuestionMsg: Are you sure you want reset your progress? This process is irrecoverable?
msg.changeLanguageErrorMsg: An error occured while changing the language:

2.description: recall to the mind/store in the memory

4.description: flat surface at the bottom of the room
